typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		actors as (name as string)[],
		availabilityDate as string,
		genre as string,
		rating as string,
		releaseYear as string,
		runtime as string,
		streamingAvailabilityDate as string,
		tier as string,
		title as string,
		id as string,
		{_rid} as string,
		{_self} as string,
		{_etag} as string,
		{_attachments} as string,
		{_ts} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		MovieID as string,
		MovieTitle as string,
		Category as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source2
source(output(
		ActorID as string,
		ActorName as string,
		Gender as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source3
source1 select(mapColumn(
		actors,
		availabilityDate,
		genre,
		rating,
		releaseYear,
		runtime,
		streamingAvailabilityDate,
		tier,
		title,
		id,
		{_rid},
		{_self},
		{_etag},
		{_attachments},
		{_ts}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 derive(id = lower(id)) ~> DerivedColumn1
source2 select(mapColumn(
		MovieID,
		MovieTitle,
		Category
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select2 derive(MovieID = lower(MovieID)) ~> DerivedColumn2
source3 select(mapColumn(
		ActorID,
		ActorName,
		Gender
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
Select3 derive() ~> DerivedColumn3
DerivedColumn1, DerivedColumn2, DerivedColumn3 union(byName: true)~> Union1
